thumb.title: 怖くても Even if it's Scary 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を恐怖の深淵へと誘う暗いメロディーを展開します。心に潜む恐れが浮かび上がり、聴く人を不安と緊張感に包み込む幻想的な旅へと導いていきます。心に響く不気味な音景が広がる中で、誰しもが抱える恐怖と向き合う貴重な体験ができるでしょう。暗闇の中に潜む恐怖感や刺激的な旋律が交錯し、聴く人の心に強烈な印象を残します！ This music unfolds a dark melody that takes the listener into an abyss of fear. The fears that lurk in the mind emerge and lead the listener on a fantastic journey that envelops them in a sense of anxiety and tension. As the haunting and eerie soundscape unfolds, the listener will have the precious experience of confronting the fears that we all have. The intermingling of the fear lurking in the darkness and the exciting melody will leave a strong impression on the listener's mind! https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
